text: An eared seal or otariid is Phocidae's family Otariidae. == Taxonomy == *Family Otariidae (Eared seals) **Genus Arctocephalus (Fur seals) **Genus Callorhinus ***Northern Fur Seal (Callorhinus ursinus) **Genus Eumetopias ***Steller Sea Lion or Northern Sea Lion (Eumetopias jubatus) **Genus Neophoca ***Australian Sea Lion (Neophoca cinerea) **Genus Otaria ***South American Sea Lion or Southern Sea Lion (Otaria flavescens, formerly Otaria byronia) **Genus Phocarctos ***New Zealand Sea Lion (Phocarctos hookeri) **Genus Zalophus ***California Sea Lion (Zalophus californianus) == Other websites == Category:Pinnipeds
title: Eared seal
